The closing ceremony for the academic year activities
23  May,  2024
In encouragement of the dedicated volunteer participants who excelled in their involvement in the activities and events organized this year within the Best Buddies Qatar Club, an artistic workshop was organized for decorating cushions. Alongside the workshop, the participants were honored by presenting them with certificates of appreciation and taking commemorative photos, in recognition of their efforts and as encouragement for them to continue their active and positive participation in the Best Buddies Qatar Club in the coming years.
